pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functional Profile Chain Ladder for Claims Reserving // Functional claims reserving methods based on aggregated chain- ladder data, also known as the run-off triangle (functional) development profiles, implemented in three nonparametric algorithms (PARALLAX, REACT, and MACRAME) proposed in Maciak, Mizera, and Peta (2022) doi:10.1017/asb.2022.4.
